headline: Align Technology, Inc. (ALGN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Align Technology, Inc. on Flyover Stocks’s Substack by Todd Wenning. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ALGN. Align Technology, Inc.’s share was trading at $131.56 as of September 12th. ALGN’s trailing and forward P/E were 22.22 and 12.24 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Align Technologies (ALGN) […]
